boardgame.name: Darkest Night (Second edition)
boardgame.description: Darkest Night, by designer Jeremy Lennert, is a fully-cooperative board game set in a kingdom broken under a Necromancer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s shadow. Each player takes on the role of one of the kingdom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s last heroes, each with a unique set of special abilities, just as they hatch a plan to save the realm._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can you save the kingdom from darkness? Do you have the courage, the cunning and the will to withstand the necromancer and his forces? Strategize, plan and bring out the best of your abilities to end our Darkest Night!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Darkest Night is expected to ship in Q2, 2017. This listing is for the Kickstarter Edition of the game, with all stretch goals included. The Miniatures are NOT included. Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Darkest Night is expected to ship in Q2, 2017. This listing is for the Kickstarter Edition of Darkest Night, Second Edition, with all stretch goals included. This includes: This Darkest Night: Second Edition Storm on the Horizon Secrets of the Past PLUS 40 new cards. PLEASE NOTE: The Miniatures are NOT included. All previous expansions from the First edition have been included in this Second Edition. Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher.

Shipping costs / Versandkosten: Germany: 5,00 € (egal, wie viele Artikel ihr bei uns kauft) EU Countries: 15,00 € (regardless how much articles You order from us) Rest of the World: We send You a mail with the shipping costs All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Kickstarter Pledge, painted Necromancer miniature, all cards sleeved, sorting box included! Very good condition, only played once. All cards are sleeved (the large character cards required manually cutting some sleeves down, so those are not 100% flawless, but offer fine protection. Sleeves for event/search cards are about 1mm short, so not a perfect fit.) Shipping (only to EU): Austria: 6€ Germany: 12€ EU: 18€ Feel free to ask for exact shipping costs before deciding. Meet up in Vienna is also a possibility. Payment preferably via Bank transfer (IBAN). Paypal is possible, but if not done via _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;friends _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; include an extra 5€.
